welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pretoria, the charming capital city of South Africa! Known for its beautiful jacaranda trees and rich history, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Rhapsody's

restaurants.address: Shop L2-33, Sunnypark Shopping Centre (Cnr. Steve Biko & Robert Sobukwe St. Sunnyside), IPitoli, 0001

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Pilanesberg Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, with a limit of 4 hours per device.
